original_text: But the Lord became very angry with the people. They had not even started to eat the meat when the Lord sent a very bad disease among them.
korean_text: 고기가 아직 이 사이에 있어 씹히기 전에 여호와께서 백성에게 대하여 진노하사 심히 큰 재앙으로 치셨으므로

sentences.original_text: But the Lord became very angry with the people
They had not even started to eat the meat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 고기를 먹기 시작조차 하지 않았는데

sentences.original_text: when the Lord sent a very bad disease among them
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들 가운데 매우 나쁜 질병을 보내셨다
